title: LF DUO - Bronze/Silver - for end of season climb - Pref adc (I play support)
body:
Looking for a duo partner that is on almost everyday to climb with.
Pref you being an adc so I can support you.
Must have discord.

Just trust, add me.

xo

replies.body:
hey i am in all that criteria. :)
I play Draven adc, then Gnar top.
https://discord.gg/swgpRn4
theirs a chat link, on everyday except Saturday, but a lot of Sunday.
